tweet.text: PUBLIC MEETING Sept. 12, 2022 at 10am EDT Join us for the open session of the Advisory Committee for Historical Diplomatic Documentation (#HAC). To register for this free online event, please send an email to FortJL@state.gov https://t.co/rAD4t5UgNj
